hero.about: Passionate about games and technology. It was this passion that led me to develop shaders for Minecraft Bedrock Edition in 2018, resulting in a total of 4300 downloads across the two released versions. This same passion also drove me to start college for Systems Analysis and Development in the second semester of 2021, where I am now in the 6th semester.

stringhini.title: Data Quality at Stringhini
stringhini.description: As a Data Quality professional, I'm dedicated to ensuring the accuracy and integrity of data, performing product registration, identification, and tagging, always striving for learning and contributing to the team's success.

about.description1: Hey there! I'm Jonas, a guy who loves technology and games. In 2018, I dove headfirst into the world of shaders, developing some for the Minecraft Bedrock Edition. Surprisingly, these shaders racked up a total of 4300 downloads in just two released versions.
about.description2: That same passion led me to start college for Analysis and Systems Development in the second semester of 2021, and now I'm in the 6th semester. With a solid background in web application development and a serious commitment to excellence, I'm always seeking challenges that help me grow professionally.
about.description3: For me, technology goes far beyond codes and algorithms. It's the art of solving complex problems innovatively. I'm always on the lookout for creative ways to tackle challenges and achieve incredible results. I'm super excited to collaborate with talented teams on challenging projects, where my experience and my thirst for continuous learning can make a difference.

note_cards.title: Note Cards
note_cards.description: I utilized the development of Note Cards to enhance my technical skills, integrating the backend developed with Java and Spring Boot, and the frontend with React and TypeScript. It was both challenging and enjoyable to acquire new knowledge throughout the process.

tech_store.title: Tech Store
tech_store.description: Developing the project was extremely challenging, especially because I chose to learn Angular during the process. Additionally, I sought to apply the principles of clean architecture cohesively to the backend, developed with Java and Spring Boot. Furthermore, I used Docker to containerize the entire project, which added complexity but also significantly facilitated the deployment process.

web_chat.title: Web Chat
web_chat.description: A WebSocket chat application using Node.js, allowing users to connect and chat in real-time.

link_aggregator.title: Link Aggregator
link_aggregator.description: A webpage created to centralize my links using HTML, CSS, and JS, perfect for sharing a variety of links in a simple and personalized way.

unit_tests.title: Unit Tests
unit_tests.description: This project was used for me to learn how to implement unit tests using JUnit and Mockito in a Spring Boot environment.

progress_track.title: Progress Track
progress_track.description: This project, led by Micael Mota in collaboration with his YouTube followers, aims to develop a goal monitoring tool. In it, I contributed by improving the login interface and implemented the goal editing functionality.
